caption: This is a close-up photograph of a person wearing a large, dark cowboy hat. The person is smiling broadly and is dressed in what appears to be a light-colored, possibly beige, collared shirt with details on the shoulders that suggest it could be a sheriff or ranger uniform. The image is taken from below, capturing the subject's face and the underside of the brim of the hat, emphasizing their facial features against a clear sky background. The sky appears slightly overexposed, emphasizing the outline of the hat and the person's face. The overall mood conveys a cheerful and proud demeanor.
title: At the "junior rodeo," sponsored by the Parker Indian Rodeo Association and held on the Colorado River Indian Reservation
